item.title: Preliminary Survey on Math Background
item.description: Due by Tuesday, January 21, 2019 Download as PDF This is an ungraded and anonymous survey for me to evaluate the distribution of your math and statistics backgrounds. Please write your answers the the following questions on a piece of paper, or download and print a PDF copy (link above) to write on. You do not need to write your name on it. Please complete all problems to the best of your ability.
